charges.charge_description: 21:846=MD.F  CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE MARIJUANA (with intent to deistribute and possession with intent to distribute a controlled substance that is more than 100 marijuana plants)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: INCARCERATION: 28 months. SUPERVISED RELEASE: 4 years. Special conditions of supervised release: Mandatory drug testing requirements are imposed. Drug aftercare conditions imposed. Defendant shall perform 50 hours of community service in lieu of paying a fine. Defendant shall cooperate in the collection of DNA. FINE and cost of imprisonment are waived. SPECIAL ASSESSMENT of $100.00 is due immediately. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal.

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=MD.F  MARIJUANA - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE (aiding and abettinbg each other and others and did knowingly  possess with intent to distribute and manufacture a controlled substance) that is more than 100 marijuana plants)(2)
21:846=MD.F  CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE MARIJUANA (with intent to deistribute and possession with intent to distribute a controlled substance that is more than 100 marijuana plants)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: INCARCERATION: 120 months. This term consists of 120 months as to each of Counts One and Two, such terms to run concurrently. SUPERVISED RELEASE: 8 years. This term shall consist of terms of 8 years on each of Counts One and Two, such terms to run concurrently. Special conditions of supervised release: Mandatory drug testing requirements are imposed. Drug aftercare conditions imposed. Defendant shall cooperate in the collection of DNA. FINE and cost of imprisonment are waived. SPECIAL ASSESSMENT of $200.00 is due immediately. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal.

charges.charge_description: 21:841A=MD.F  MARIJUANA - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE (aiding and abettinbg each other and others and did knowingly  possess with intent to distribute and manufacture a controlled substance) that is more than 100 marijuana plants)(2)

The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal.
